content:
You simply must check out https://ask.dataverse.org by our own @Slava Tykhonov who announced it today.

Here's the idea, from my perspective. Our documentation and website are public, of course. Plus, for years and years we have been transparent in our communication throughout the project in the form of this chat service (Zulip), Google Groups, GitHub Issues, etc.

Now, for the first time, all of this information about Dataverse is searchable in one place. Not only that, because an LLM is used, we can use natural language to ask questions about Dataverse. Again, please give it a try and provide feedback! Thanks!
I love it! Thanks @Slava Tykhonov fantastic new resource and innovation! :)
This is super cool and helpful! :tada: :glowing_star: :heart:

I probably did it wrong (see screenshot) :joy: . But for some other tests, it worked great. It definitely makes it easier to find certain info in the documentation :tada:
image.png
Thanks for the feedback, Dieuwertje! Please add the missing page in Ask Dataverse if you'll find it. That's the whole idea to keep all information in one place.

Screenshot 2024-12-11 at 09.59.20.png
If you'll add "in Dataverse", it's able to find the information. I didn't expected people from SpaceX will start to use it.
Hmm, can we feed "in Dataverse" to the prompt automatically? Would that help? Do we already feed anything into the prompt?
good idea
I didn't added extra in prompt
gotcha
I just announced that @Slava Tykhonov will be presenting Ask Dataverse at the community call on Tuesday: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/Lrtm1b1V51M/m/kPpvZNsdDwAJ
Starting in about 40 minutes!
The recording is up! https://harvard.zoom.us/rec/share/bOizatNdMdxINRCnqpt87fPITPvsDWTv3ysvA8kIaEE4wnmZPSeSUkdmpKYP1ooA.rKoNMqED_L8KtHOi
Here are the slides: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1HFN-wAe4eUGwJAhYCLbNcNHAsi-Hy8jQ/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=117275479921759507378&rtpof=true&sd=true
And notes: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Dz07WKceGrBGdq5wWf0NJS08CO0FEmi4TgQBcsDcpRE/edit?usp=sharing
Thanks, @Slava Tykhonov! Great job! :heart:
Added to https://dataverse.org/dataversetv but @Slava Tykhonov can you please suggest a description?
I send the links around: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/Lrtm1b1V51M/m/YqZU6YFhEAAJ

Via @Oliver Bertuch: https://github.com/jacobtomlinson/sphinx-llm

@Slava Tykhonov maybe it could help ask.dataverse.org more easily read the guides.
How would you like to know about "improvements " needed? I tested one feature today and it leaves out a crucial piece of the instructions. @Slava Tykhonov
@Slava Tykhonov getting a bad gateway error message when I try to access the site
Hi @Sonia Barbosa , sorry, server in France got upgraded and something went wrong. Ask service is restored now.
